member_organisations:
The Commercial Federation of Iceland (LIV) 
Federation of General and Special workers in Iceland (SGS) 
Union of Icelandic Electricial Workers (RSI) 
Federation of Skilled Construction and Industrial Workers (SAMIDN) 
Federation of Icelandic Seamen (SSI) 
+ 6 national trade unions in different industries.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Single market, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: ASI participates in the Social Dialogue at EU level as member of ETUC. ASI also follows developments in various areas related to EEA and the Single Market as well as promoting the interests of Icelandic workers at EEuropean level.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Icelandic Confederation of Labour (ASI) is a Trade Union Confederation with affillated federations and unions in all industries covering both the private and public sectors. The principle tasks of ASI is to service its affilliated organisations and to represent them in dialogue and negotiations at national level, with the employers organisations, the political system and the state. ASI also repersents the trade union movement in governmental bodies and agencies and in international organisations.
